an10.192:0.3: The Teaching of the True Persons
an10.192:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the true persons and the teaching of the untrue persons.
an10.192:1.3: And what is the teaching of the untrue persons?
an10.192:1.6: This is the teaching of the untrue persons.
an10.192:2.1: And what is the teaching of the true persons?
an10.192:2.4: This is the teaching of the true persons.”
